job.title: Tesla Recharge "Returnship" Program - Software Engineer, Back End
job.description: strongRolebrbrstrongTeslas Recharge Program is your pathway to returning to a fulltime career after a career break of more than a year During our 16week program you will refresh your existing skill sets and learn new technologies with supportive mentors by your side We foster professional growth in a structured environment through a combination of training and handson projects You will be empowered to take on new challenges that will allow you to reclaim both your skills and confidence in the workplacebrbrAre you ready to Recharge you careerbrbrAs a Software Engineer youll take part in the design and development of software for the current and next generation of Teslas Enterprise Resource Planning systems Digital Experience Manufacturing and Service SoftwarebrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliWork with experienced engineers across many functional areas to deliver business value to internal and external stakeholdersliliDesign and Develop scalable applications using tools like C NET Golang MySQL and other open stack frameworksliliSeek to understand all aspects business and technical of the applications on which you work so that you can be most effectiveliliContribute towards the timely completion of development tasks and small projects while applying company standardsliliContinually learn and apply relevant software development practices patterns tools and technologiesliliIncrease efficiency reduce waste wherever and whenever possiblebrbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulliMust be returning from a recent career gap of at least 1 yearlili2 years of experience in web application development including Implementing Application Programming Interfaces APIs Object Oriented Programming and Design OOPampD Object Relational Mapping ORMliliExperience in backend development using tools such as C Java Go Ruby Python etcliliRelational databases SQL NoSQLliliAgile DevelopmentliliDistributed Source Control using tools such as GitliliBSMS in Computer Science or equivalent degreeliul
